constituent: lips, sign of the dragon, cliff, two, hairpin, safety-pin, mouth
koohiiStory1: Sign of the Dragon + Mouth: Lips need chapstick during the wintertime so they don't look like the sign of the dragon who kissed you on the mouth.
koohiiStory2: As I approached her lips, I began to sense the sign of the dragon breath coming from her mouth, and I almost fainted.
